column1: Smoque BBQ////So. I kind of did. I got a half slab of the St. Louis ribs and a side of brisket. My lovely boyfriend was so kind to get the pulled pork sandwich
column2: so I got to try some of his as well. Everything was delicious. I don't know what brisket these other people are eating
column3: but mine was quite tender and not dry at all. The ribs had the nice pull to them that you expect from St. Louis ribs
column4: and I really appreciate the fact that you get different sauces for different meats. A-plus.
